summary: REQ-13 and REQ-14 appear implemented (siteConfig.name updated and HTML <title> updated). Header and footer now reference a new logo path, but the diff summary does not show the actual Quick bee logo asset being added/replaced, so REQ-15 cannot be fully verified from the provided changes. Some additional footer logic/attribution appears added that was not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current generated logo asset used in the header and footer with the user-uploaded Quick bee logo (including exporting the wide wordmark agency-logo-quickbee.dim_512x256.png with transparent background).
missing_requirements.reason: Header/Footer were updated to reference /assets/generated/agency-logo-quickbee.dim_512x256.png, but the diff shows no added or modified image/logo asset files, so the actual replacement/export of the uploaded logo cannot be confirmed from this diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer-specific appIdentifier logic based on window.location.hostname (fallback 'quickbee-agency').
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; BuildRequest only asks for branding name/title/logo updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking mentioned in footer implementation summary.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals include avoiding changes beyond branding/logo, and this attribution/tracking is unrelated to REQ-13/14/15.
